question:
Q1: What is the main purpose of antimicrobial agents? 
A. To prevent growth of bacteria on surfaces 
B. To remove any bacteria or germs that may be present on a surface 
C. To help deal with a bacterial infection 
D. To limit microbial growth 

Q2: What type of antibiotic is penicillin? 
A. Antimicrobial agent 
B. Disinfectant 
C. Antibiotic 
D. None of the above 

Q3: How can you determine what type of antibiotic resistance a bacteria has? 
A. By looking at the size of the bacteria 
B. By looking at the space of the area 
C. By looking at a code 
D. By looking at the type of antibiotic
answer:
Q1: A 
Q2: C 
Q3: C
